recipesJson.name: Caribbean Swag
recipesJson.author: xsquisite1
recipesJson.description: I wanted to get a good Papaya taste. It's a fruit that you do not see used a lot, and while I think FA Papaya is good, too much of it can get kinda funky. I also wanted a bit of sweetness to it without overwhelming the mix. I opted to enhance it with both Inawera exotic and FA coconut. The exotic while listed as pineapple pom and mango, I get a hint of papaya from it, maybe it's just me. The FA coconut puts a little balance in this.  My goal was simple, a good smooth fruit vape without sweetener added and to utilize ingredients outside my comfort zone in low%
